column3: is an important character in Hindu mythology. His bones are used as a symbol on India's highest award for gallantry "Param Vir Chakra" as "vajra". He was one of the greatest among clan of bhrigus. He is credited with giving up his life in order to allow the Devas to use his bones to make weapons to defeat the Asura Vritra.
